430a5(rgyud 'grel): ring po mi thogs par tshe 'di nyid la sgrib pa zad par bya ba dang / bstod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bla ma las sngags gang yang rung bya zhig ji lta ba bzhin du mnos te/ sngags ji ltar
430a6(rgyud 'grel): mnos pa bslabs pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gong du smos pa spyod cing // gnas dben po 'du 'dzi med pa 'tshe ba med pa
430b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod pa'i ri phug gam sul lAm nags la sogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa 'am gtsug lag
430b2(rgyud 'grel): khyang dang khang pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa dang ldan par tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms po'i sems kyis 'du 'dzi med par chos kyi dga' ba'i longaso spyod la dad pa bskyed blo dang spro ba dang sems dpa' bya phun sum
430b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa mchog dang ldan par byas la gnod pa thams cad la ji mi snyam zhing dge bar 'tsho ba dang ldan pas dga' bar gnas par bya'o// der gnos nas blo brtan pas nang par langs nas dgra'i 'khor ma lus
430b4(rgyud 'grel): par spang la snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa bskul pa rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pas khyis byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung nges pa med/ dge bar spyad pa mtshan nyid ji skad bsgrags pa'i nang gi
430b5(rgyud 'grel): khrus byed pas sa gzhi gtsang mar dkyil 'khor me tog gis gtor bar sku gzugs sam mchod rten ni ma pa'o chos kyi glegs bam gang yang rung ba zhig mdun du bzhag gam/ sku gzugs la sogs pa med
430b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang rung ste shar phyogs sam byang phyogasu bltas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dang ba bskyed de dag ji ltar rigs par phyogs bcur mngon sum bzhin du dmigs la phyag bya
431a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i cho gas bdag yongasu sbyad pa 'di ltar bya ste/ de dag gi rim pa ni 'di'o// dang por sngags pas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ rim gro bskyed la gus par phyag 'di ltar bya'o// phyogs
431a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu 'tha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chosu bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chen po'i dge 'dun du
431a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'chilo// de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btung te busam pa thag pa nas 'di skad ces brjod// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
431a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor la na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang bdag gis bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal pa dang rjesu yi rang
431a5(rgyud 'grel): dang de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la so sor bshagaso zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de nas skyabasu 'gro ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da pe'i thams cad bdag la
431a6(rgyud 'grel): dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lo skyabasu mchi'o// bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
431b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i chos kyi sku so so rang gis rig pa la skyabasu mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabasu mchi'o// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de nas de'i
431b2(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu bdag gi ngo bo dbul te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol bdag ming zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang
431b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gi ngo bo dus thad du yong ye 'bul gyis thugs rje chen po rnams kyis bdag bzhes shig ces lan gsum du brjo do// de nas sems can sdug bsngal thams cad la snying
431b4(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po mngon du bya ste byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa ni/ sangs rgyas drang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// dngos po tha~Md dang bral ba phung po dang khams drang skye mched dang gzung
431b5(rgyud 'grel): bu dang 'dzin pa rnam pa ro spangs pa chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems thog ma nus ma skyes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
431b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub du sems bskyo do zhes lan gsum du brjed//
432a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bsod nams kyi rjesu yi rang ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjesu yi
432a2(rgyud 'grel): rang ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas drung byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams dang 'gro ba ma
432a3(rgyud 'grel): lus pa'i bsod nams la rjesu yi rang ngo zhes lnga gsum du brjod// de nas gsol ba gle ba pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos chos kyi char dbab pa dang thabs
432a4(rgyud 'grel): ngang tshul sna tshogs kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing rtag tu bzhugs par gsolo zhes lan gsum du brjod// de nas sems can la phan pa bstabs pa ni sems can thams cad ngan pa'i mtha' dbugs
432a5(rgyud 'grel): ma phyin pa so so'i skye bo'i gnas myur du spangs te bde ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob par gyur cig dam pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyang de'i gong nas gong
432a6(rgyud 'grel): du 'ophar ba'i khyad par thob nas bla na med pa'i byang chub pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces lan gsum du brjod// de nas sems can thams cad la bdag gi bsod nams bsngo ba ni/
432b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i bskyod nas kyi bsngo ba ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bdag gi bsod nams ma lus pa yang sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i bde ba ma thob pa rnams
432b2(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o zhes lan gsum du brjod// phyag 'tshal bai la sogs pa 'di rnams ci nus pa las gzhan du yang rung ngo // de ltar bsam pa yongasu sbyangs pa des
432b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po las yongs mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir skyil mo krung bcas te de ma tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag
432b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ni thal mo sbyar te mthe bong gnyis bsgre // phyag rgya 'di ni rgyu chenA te// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyi yino// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas// de'i sngags ni 'di'o//
432b5(rgyud 'grel): mos+sa man+ta budz+nyAnA~M/ a sa me tri sa me sa ma ye swA hA// dI nas chos kyi dbyangs kyi phyag rgya bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ni ldog pa gnyis khu tshur btsongs l-I mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug ste mdzub myo gnyis
432b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng ngo // do ni chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya ste sngags ni 'di'o// na mas+pho man+ta bud+d+ho nA~M d+harma d+ha tu sIb+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni lag pa gnyis kyi ser mo rgya ba spyod du bsnol la
433a1(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo gnyis kyang spra // rgya mchog dpal dang ldan pA ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba yin// 'jig rten mgron po skyong ba yi// 'khor lo rab tu'i sgyu ro// de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na mas+sa man+ta badz+rA NAM
433a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rAt+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sngag so// yi ge ri dkar po yang spyi bor bA sam mo// de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar gtugs na gau bgos par 'gyur ro// thul mo sbyar te mdzub
433a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbya ro mthe bo gnyis gung myo la gzharo// rdo rje go tshwa'i phyag rgya ste de'i sngags ni 'di'o// na mAswa mAn+ta badz+ri NA badz+ra ka pA tsa hUM// de nas bgegs tha~Md rnam par sel pa mo zad pa rig
433a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags chen mo rjesu dran par bya ba'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis rtse sprad srin lag gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad bkug pa 'di ni srung ba
433a5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'i phyag rgya ste de'i sdug s+yo ni 'di'o// nA ma s+yArba ta thA gau te b+h+yas+sarba b+hA ya bi ga twe b+h+yo be shwa mu khe b+h+yas+sarba thA hi khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba la sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya ni ro dzAM te hUM hU~M tra Ta tA Ta a pra ti ha twe swAh+ma/ bgegs dang
433a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan khrid thams cad dang / srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams// 'di ni dran pa tsamo gyis// de dag thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// de nas sems mnyam par bzhag ste mdun du rgya mtsho chen po bsams la
433b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus nas ri rab gru bzhi lte ba byung ba'i steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa rtseg pa'i nang na pad+ma'i seng+ge'i gdan chen po pad+ma'i gdun chung du mang pos bskor bar bas mo// de la rgya mtsho chen po la sogs ji
433b2(rgyud 'grel): wA ra bsams pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ba ra sngags 'dis byin+da gyis brla'o// na masa? mAn+ta bud+d+hA nAM aM A na maHsarba ta thA gra te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+husmarba thA ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi mau ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de ltar na d+he
433b3(rgyud 'grel): dag thad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// yang nA na mkha' mdzod kyi rig sngags kyis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i seng+ge'i gdan de la spongs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad guser gyi kha dog thor
433b4(rgyud 'grel): tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang cod pan can dar la'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can nam/ shAkya thub pa cha byed drung kha dog dang dbyibs ji skad du grags pa'ang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po la phun 'dogs
433b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad pa 'di 'phro ba mang pos mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gsal bar snang ba sems can gyi khyams re ba ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar mdzad pa skyil mo krung bcas te tinge 'dzin du
433b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par bas mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas logs kyi pad+ma la spyan ras gzigs dbang po g.yon logs kyi pad+ma laM rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs par bas mo// bdag gi lha yang bcom ldan 'das
434a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdun g.yas logs kyi bung+ga la bzhugs par bsam/ kho ra khor yug gam pad+ma gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyir mi ldog pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad
434a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la thogs pa med pa'i mthu brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa rnams bzhugs par bas mo// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu dang / bdag gi lha dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhugs
434a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bas mo// bdag gi lha rdo rje 'dzin yin nA g.yasu bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po g.yon du bzhago// yang nA lha rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang rung ngo // de nas bcom ldan
434a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yi ge bkod pas bzhag pa ni/ na ma swa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM a/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yi ge ni b+hu ste/ nu mas+sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM b+ha/ de bzhin du spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i ni/ na mas+sa man+ta
434a5(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+hA nAM se/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi ni na ma s+sa man+ta badz+rA NAM ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni/ nA mas man+ta bud+d+hA nAM kA/ bdag gi lha yang de'i yi ge gang yin pas gzhago/ yang na byang chub sems dpa'i yi ges gzhag par
434a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dper byin gyis brlab pa ni/ na maswa man+ta badz+rA NAM ba/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
434b1(rgyud 'grel): la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya gong du smos pa bstan te/ de'i sngags lan gsum bzlas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig gzigs pas mnyes te gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzhed pa
434b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du byin gyis brla'o// de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya dang sngogs lan gsum brjod pas bskyed par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na
434b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug par bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho byAh+ma gI phyi rol tu 'phyags pa mi goyo bo'i sngags kyis mtshams bcad par bya ste de'i phyag rgya ni 'dri'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo
434b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag dang mtha'u chung gnyis kyi rtser mthe bos mnan/ lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo dong gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthil du gzhugo/ mi g.yo mgon gyi
434b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rAl gr-igri shu ba sr-i bcug pa ste sngags ni/ ne mas+sa man+ta badz+rA NAM a tsa la kA Na tsan+da ma hA ro ShA Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tra ga hi mau/ lan gsum du'o// ralaM gri shu bas+ya nAs byAd+yA wa bskyu pa ni g+ha yona? nas skor mtsham
434b6(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa ni g.yas nas bskor ro// de bzhin du 'dis las gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang ji ltar rig par bya'o// sku gzugs sam mchod rten yod na dang po nyid du chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs
435a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chus bkrus la de nas gdong la 'di dag kun bya'o// de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spyi bo btud la yon chab dang por gsol nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mcho bo// yon
435a2(rgyud 'grel): chab la sogs pa de dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i chu 'am chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bzhag pa'i chus gtor te sbyangs la mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang so so'i sngags kyis lan gsum du btab ste/
435a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod cing dbu'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po la phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// zhes pa la sogs
435a4(rgyud 'grel): pa de dag gis mtshan nas smos lnga ji skad du bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod pa bya'o// yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod nas
435a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la khyab pa'i yid kyis chod pa'i yo byad rnams re re nas dbulo// de la mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ni thul mo khong stong du sbyar ba'o// yon chab dang spos la sogs pa'i sngags ni
435a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnamaso// na mos+sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM ga ga na sa ma sa mo swA hA/ yon chab kyi sngag so// na mas+sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM bi shud+d+hi gan+d+hot+ta bo swA hAM/ spos kyi sngagaso// na me sr-i man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA mai d+yang+gu ta ga te swA hA/ me tog sngags
435b1(rgyud 'grel): so// na mAs+sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM d+har+m+ma d+hA tA nu ga te swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngag so// na mas+sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA gra ta Artsa s+pha ra Na b+hA ba sa ga ga nau dAr+ya swA hA// mA ra me'i sngag so// rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i yon chad la sogs pa'i
435b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btA ba tsaMng mchod na 'dra nyes bre me do// 'dir spos la sogs pa mchod phye rnam bzhi smos pa'ang bcom ldan 'das le mchod pa'i yo byad mtshan ma tsam bstan par zad kyi de kho nar nges pa ni medo// /
435b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas na 'jig rten bsngags pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams 'byor na 'phags pa mi g.yo pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yi gres bsangs la dbu lo// mchod pa'i yo byad rnams ma 'byor na yang sems rab tu dang byas
435b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bya ba'i bsam pa bskyed la mchod byi'o phyag rgya dang sngags rnams brjod na thaMd rdzogs byar byas por 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu na mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang yid kyis dbul bar bya ste de'i thabs kyang 'di'o//
435b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu na sa dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che dang mai trokA lce sogs pa mdzes pa'i dngos po de rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul zhes thal mo sbyar la/ sems thag pa nas
435b6(rgyud 'grel): phul na mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro// de nas yang spyi bor mchod pa'i phyag rgya byas la phyogs bcu na bzhugs po'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dus thams cad du rnyed slab yongasu
436a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa/ rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'di ltar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis byin
436a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs kyis mthu dang / bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes dang smon lam gyis mthus/ dam pa rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings khyab pa mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang bstod pa dang rgyan dom pa sna tshogs
436a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis kyang brlabs par gyur cig ces
436a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod dam bsams la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i rig sngags chen po 'di lan lena? gsum brjod do// nu mAs+sa mAman+ma bud+d+ha nAM/ a s+pha ra hi mau/ ga ga naM khaM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA trA k+Sha rA sa ma tA yA
436a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba twe thA ga ta/ paR+Sha Ta maN+Da la ma ma pra NI d+hi pu n+yA dz+nyA na bi lo/ sarba ta thA ga te a d+hiSh+Tha nAM na tsa swAhA// de ltar mchod pa chen po'i sprin dI bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho
436a6(rgyud 'grel): du de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur bar/ yid ches par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// myur du 'grub par byed pa rdo rje 'dzin gyi glu bstod pa dam pa 'dis kyang dus gsum pa'i rnams la
436b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod par bya'o// mnyam myed mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad stsol// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam
436b2(rgyud 'grel): chos can// yon tan phra mo'i cha la'ang mtha' med de// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dbyer mi rung // rtag tu sems can rnams la grub mchog stsol// dpe dang bral ba'i dngos grub mtha' yas
436b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rtag tu rI med thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub bya mi 'gag chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub brtson 'grus mtha' yas bya// thugs d+he'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa snang // mtha
436b4(rgyud 'grel): yis dpag med go 'phang rAb bI rnyes kyang // khams gsum kun tu dngos grub mchog stsol la// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo rgyun mi gcod// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid cu ni// mgon
436b5(rgyud 'grel): bo dus gsum gshegs shing sgrib med pa// rtag tu khams gsum kun la mchog sbyin grub// mchog sbyin mtshig gi gnas ni ri ba brnyes pa// dam tshig mchog sum grub pa badrug la stsol/
436b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la skyabasu mchis kyis bdag la thugs rjes gzigs te/ 'gro ba ma lus pa yongasu bsgrub pa'i mthu bdag la stsol
437a1(rgyud 'grel): cig ces kyang brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams klas pa ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bya ste de'i cho ga ni 'di'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i phyogs bcu
437a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du dam pa rgya chen po sems can gyi don mdzad pa khwa ton dang tshul dang snod lam rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan pa kun tu bzang po sprul pa mang po rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ dos kyang sems
437a3(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi phyi nang gi mri ba de pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing de bzhi na ga rtogs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa 'jig rten dang la jig rten las 'das pa ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs
437a4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyang de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces bsams nas/ byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu drang chos
437a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems na rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ sngar bsums pa'i don de dag thams cad sems can gyi khams 'dir ji ltar
437a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs par myur du 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod de/ de nas sems can gyi don gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags na mkha'i mdzod 'byung bar mdzad pa 'di lan gsum brjod do// na maHsarba ta thA ga
437b1(rgyud 'grel): te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA kham Ang+ga te s+phu ra d+hA NI maM ga ga na khAM swAh+na// 'di lan gsum+bu bAzlas+t+ra pAs dzI wAr bsamya pa'i don rnams sems can gyi khams 'dir de bzhin du 'gyur bA ra bA ra sangs rgyas
437b2(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub se mos dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen gyi// gzhan shes pa chung ngu rnams kyis ni mi shes so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyisku gsungs te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams
437b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis yi chos b+hurar+ya bya'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byas shing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas pa des bdag gi lho'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa la sogs pas bdag nyid lha'i
437b4(rgyud 'grel): skyur bsgyur la yi gr-i khaM dkar po yang spyi bor bzhag ste/ mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsamos la der yi ge sbyar ba byos te// dbugs dang dran pa rab tu bsdams nas slar sdud pa'i
437b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis non par yid la 'am/ shub+da ste/ mI drag mi dal baR+Sha mI skyo ba 'amau ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// slob dpon dbang bskur bas ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyer bsgyur te/
437b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa 'am byang chub sems dpa'i sngags zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas bzlas pa bya'o// ji skad du bshad pa ltar ma nus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha ma sa
438a1(rgyud 'grel): cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs pa'i sems sam/ sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la rjesu yi rang bar dmigs shing bzlas pa'o// de nas ngal lam gtong 'dod na bzlas pa
438a2(rgyud 'grel): btang ste/ yang las kyi rdo rjer bdag bsgyur la snga mu bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstod cing mchod pa byas la/ dge ba ci byas pa yongasu bsngos la bdag kyang dge ba'i las 'dis
438a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lus sgrol nus par gyur cig/ bdag num sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang skyes so cog tu byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bdagi ngo bo
438a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'khor dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang longs spyod phun sum tshogs par shog cig ces brjod do// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' skyong ba rnams bdag theg pa chen po las mi mnyam
438a5(rgyud 'grel): shing phyud par thob par byin gyisku rlob shig cesu gsol b+ha bya'o// de nas yon chab phul te/ gdon mi za bar bdag lnga yod// rjes su gzung pur dgongs nas su// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams/
438a6(rgyud 'grel): ci 'ad bar ni gshegs su gsol// de nas spyi bor dam tshi gro gsum gyi phyag rgya byas te gyen du bkrol nas sngar dam tshig gi phyir zhugs pa rnams gshegs par 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa'ang yid kyis
438b1(rgyud 'grel): dgrol lo// de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bdag rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs po// spyi bor chos kyi dbying
438b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge'ang bsam mo// rdo N+Di go tshwa'i phyag rgyas gro cha yang bgos la sangs rgyas dbu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byas nas dge ba'i las dam pa bya brir bsam zhing ljang ngo // langs nus kyang
438b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa'i mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba dag lha la stsogs pa gnyer te chos sbyin pa'i sems kyis bklag/ de nas lus gso ba'i phyir zas bza' ba'i rim pa'ang 'di'o//
438b4(rgyud 'grel): dang por ci 'byor pa'i zas la sngags lan gsum mum bdun du bdab bo// na masma man ta bud d+ha nAM/ oM a mr-i tod+b+ha ba swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phud
438b5(rgyud 'grel): phul te/ dri'i 'og tu sems can la yang byin la ro la ma tshogs par rigs pa dang ran par bza'o// de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la drag po gdon mi zo ba'i snying pos zas kyi lhag ma'i
438b6(rgyud 'grel): chang bu la btab ste dbul lo// de'i sngags ni na ma sra man+ta badz+rA NA na tra Ta a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho ta ya hUM tra Ta ya haM maM/ gdon mi za bar drag po'i snying po'o// de ltar byas na
439a1(rgyud 'grel): de mnyes nas rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de nas zas zos te ngal bso nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig bshags la sogs
439a2(rgyud 'grel): pa de bzhin du bya ste dam pa'i chos kun tu dga' bar gnas so// de phyi dro'ang bzlas pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas nas srong dang tho rangs la dam pI cho so la brtson par bya ste nam gyi gung ya mal sa la
439a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan log kun gyis phyag 'tshal nas byang chub kyi sems rin po che rjes su dran par byas te/ khams snyoms par bya
439a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i phyir nyalnga gyi gnyid kyi bde ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// sngar glo g.yas pas nyal nu phyis ni ci bder ro// de nas phyi de nyin yang cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// de ltar sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub
439a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas rgyun mo 'chad par bya'o// ji skad bshad pa bzhin mi nus na slad ci nus pas sngags kyi lha mnyes par bya'i mi rung snyom pa'i dogs pa ni mo bskyod do// sangs rgyas
439a6(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjer gzung ba dang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du smon lam gdab pa 'di gnyis ni yongs su mi gtang ngo // 'di gnyis yongs su ma
439b1(rgyud 'grel): btang na cho ga gzhan rnams ma nus kyang bzlas pa rtag par brtson 'grus su byas na des kyang rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub nges par 'thob bo// 'di la nang gi gtsang sbra gtso bo ste de bos na phyi rol
439b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtsang sgra la chags par mi bya'o// bza' ba 'dres pa la sogs pa nyes pa'i dogs pa yang mi bya'o// lus gso ba'i phyir ni phyi rol gyi khrus la sogs pa yang bya ste/ de'ang 'bab chu la sogs
439b3(rgyud 'grel): pa khrus byed 'dod na thog mar 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis sa gtsang ma blangs te lan gsum bsngags la sngags dos bdog bsrungs la chu'i gdug pa'ang bskyed de mtshams bcad la sngags
439b4(rgyud 'grel): des chu lo 'ang bsngags te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang mang du phul nas yid lce dran par byed cing sa des ya ribs kyi tshul bzhin khrus bya'o// de zhes
439b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshigra la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsum po byas la chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'ang spyi bor bsam/ rdo rje glo chas kyang po dag bgos la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o rnams la chab
439b6(rgyud 'grel): phul te sems can la phano ba bsngags pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te ldang ngo // mtshams bcad pa'ang yod kyis bkrol la gnas su mi g.yeng bar 'gro'o// yang na khrus kyi gnas de nyid du

440a2(rgyud 'grel): rlo ts+tsha 'di nyid la 'tshe de thams ts+tshid+hi me byA dang mnan me du bats+tshis da rnams cad nas bir mA rA du'i m+WAr // s+'un+ten+te m+bu ma med pa to// dmA
440a3(rgyud 'grel): s+t+raiThA swA Sh+man+te/ de phyir mchen mi cho ga cam// sbyin med phyur ni 'dir ba shadzod// b+hir+d+he smA mad+d+ho sgrub
440a4(rgyud 'grel): dzad pa rdzogs so// sod dusasu sto sargyas kyi nas gyur 'gro'i skyes/
440a5(rgyud 'grel): sle ste sa snyan// dge 'angs dus su'i ni khye chu yis bcil pa sbyin// du byung rdar tI'i 'i so yang snga gro nos ma grong so sa no gsu ma tshon rje kyi
